name: Pruva Reproduction Environment
postCreateCommand: REPRO_ID=$(cd /workspaces/pruva-sandbox && { git branch --show-current; git log -1 --format=%D HEAD; git branch -r --points-at HEAD; } 2>/dev/null | grep -o 'REPRO-[0-9]\{4\}-[0-9]\{5\}' | head -1) && [ -n "$REPRO_ID" ] && pruva-verify "$REPRO_ID" || echo 'Welcome to Pruva Sandbox! Run: pruva-verify <REPRO-ID>'
